thread.title: 2 held without bond in Vicksburg death
thread.title_full: 2 held without bond in Vicksburg death - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: 2 held without bond in Vicksburg death
text:
VICKSBURG, Miss. (AP) - Two Vicksburg men remained in the Warren County Jail without bail after their initial appearance on multiple charges - including first-degree murder in a Wednesday night shooting death.
The victim in that shooting was 21-year-old Reginald Davis. Police believe he died during a robbery.
During hearings Friday, Municipal Judge Toni Walker Terrett declined to set bail for 18-year-old Jamarcus Carter and 21-year-old Leroy Stewart.
The Vicksburg Post reports ( http://bit.ly/1PJZRfD ) that the two also are charged with armed robbery, aggravated assault and conspiracy to commit robbery. Stewart is also charged with possession of a weapon by a convicted felon. The two are expected to enter pleas at a later date.
Information from: The Vicksburg Post, http://www.vicksburgpost.com
